name: Krusader
description: Krusader is an advanced twin panel (commander style) file manager for KDE Plasma and other desktops in the *nix world, similar to Midnight or Total Commander. It provides all the file management features you could possibly want.

paths.name: Filesystem MOS
paths.description: Access to MOS filesystem for file management operations.

ports.name: WebUI Port
ports.description: Web interface port for accessing Krusader.

variables.name: USER_LOCALES
variables.description: System locale settings for language and character encoding.

variables.name: CUSTOM_RES_W
variables.description: Custom screen resolution width in pixels.

variables.name: CUSTOM_RES_H
variables.description: Custom screen resolution height in pixels.

variables.name: RUNASROOT
variables.description: Run container as root user (not recommended for security reasons).

variables.name: UMASK
variables.description: File creation mask for permission control.

variables.name: UID
variables.description: User ID for file permissions and ownership.

variables.name: GID
variables.description: Group ID for file permissions and ownership.
